title: Revert Leblanc
body: I hate the new Leblanc. It's clunky, feels like I'm playing just a shitty Ahri. I play Leblanc because I want to assassinate an out of position ADC. Not use chains to peel the front line late game over and over. Yes Leblanc is good right now but we all know she's going to get gutted. I just want my smooth fun Leblanc back. Please realize this shit deserve to just get kog maw'd and reverted.

replies.body:
Old leblanc main, I agree she feels clunkier, but the added 1.5 adds SOME degree of outplay even if it isn't that much.

Old leblanc would wqre in and burst an adc in .5 seconds.

Isk I agree they need to fix the clunkiness but the old kit was so unfair to squishies

You could only wqre from fog and i think an ADC should be punish for walking near fog without a support or top near them with a lb in the game. 1.5 seconds is ridiculous tho. You will never be able to sit that long in a team fight against a decent team.

If they do end up reverting this "rework"(which I really hope they do), I'd like them to consider keeping the ult the same. Not the clone part, just the way it functions. Being able to combo however the hell I want is pretty neat.

Do you not think it adds to the clunkyness of lb tho? Having to use 3 buttons for 2spells seems to feel way slower then the old school way plus it rewarded thinking about what spells you use in what order. I admit this could just be cause I'm salty about new lb
